text: Sanga, jo margabhrastateta asato, dayavana allaha tyala khupa dirgha sandhi deto, yethaparyanta ki tyane tya gosti pahuna ghyavyata, jyancyavisayi vayade kele jata aheta, arthata allahatarphe siksa-yatana kinva kayamatala tya veli tyanna cangalya prakare kaluna ye'ila ki kona va'ita padaca ahe ani konaca jatha(samuha) kamakuvata ahe
